job.title: Senior Software Engineer
job.description: Edina, MN  As a member of the WEX Health Platform Services team, the Software Engineer role will work closely with the Application Security Architect and Enterprise Architecture to enhance the security of our systems by analyzing design and architecture of existing systems with an eye to security gaps, issues and potential improvements. Additionally, will perform ethical hacks, design reviews, security code reviews and analyze security assessments from external security firms. Confirmed issues will be reported as bugs, and issues will be researched and analyzed to propose solid fixes via documented solutions and/or example code. This individual will see resolution of issues through to completion.  In addition, this role will work with project teams during all phases of projects where application development may be required from a Platform Services perspective. One example is platform solutions that interface with third party Vendor SAAS solutions such as Sengrid and Twilio.  This role will also keep current with security industry best practices and use such knowledge to contribute to security policies, procedures, and development team training programs. Members of this team are expected to actively participate in all stages of the development lifecycle, and work closely with representatives from other teams such as QA, Product Development, Database, and IT.
